features: One 60-count pack of BIC Round Stic Xtra Life Assorted Ink Ballpoint Pens
Versatile 1.0mm medium point pens write 90 percent longer than PaperMate InkJoy 100 pens and are No. 1 selling ballpoint pens in the US
Reliable BIC pens that spread the ink smoothly and evenly, providing consistent ink flow
Writing pens with a translucent barrel shows the current ink supply, so you can know when to grab a new pen from the pack
Dependable ball point pens bulk pack with a round, comfortable barrel design and frosted cap — a sleek, practical choice for office or school supplies
Classic ballpoint pens available in 1.0 mm medium point and multiple colors—red pens, blue pens and black pens
body.description: Combine longevity, consistent performance and smooth writing with BIC Round Stic Xtra Life Assorted Ink Ballpoint Pens. These 1.0mm medium point pens write 90 percent longer on average compared to PaperMate InkJoy 100 stick ball pens* and are the No. 1 selling ballpoint pens in the US**. Creating clear, vivid lines, they’re the ideal assorted pens for writing lists, taking notes, journaling and more. The flexible round barrel fits snugly in your hand and offers a controlled yet comfortable hold, making it ideal for prolonged writing sessions. Plus, these writing pens provide consistent ink flow and let you write smoothly. With this 60-count assorted ink pens bulk pack, you can write clearly and comfortably. Looking for reliable pens for school or office supplies? Choose BIC Round Stic Xtra Life Assorted Ink Ballpoint Pens for a high-quality and affordable product you can trust — write first time, every time. *Paper Mate and InkJoy are trademarks of Newell or an affiliate. Newell has not sponsored or approved and is not affiliated with this BIC branded product. **Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service and Commercial Tracking Service, U.S., based on actual unit sales, 12ME June 2022 combined.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features & Benefits Designed for Comfort and Convenience The Round Stic Xtra Life Ball Pen features a flexible round barrel that fits snugly in the hand for hours of comfortable writing. The frosted cap and translucent barrel give the pen a sleek look and keep the ink supply visible, so you can see at a glance how much ink is remaining. #1 Selling Ball Pen* The BIC Round Stic Xtra Life Ball Pen offers consistent performance, making it the #1 Selling Ball Pen in the U.S.* The versatile 1.0mm medium point creates vivid, highly visible lines ideal for doodling, note-taking, drafting, journaling, and other writing activities. Available in black, blue, or red ink, this dependable stick pen will no doubt become your everyday pen of choice. *Source: The NPD Group/ U.S. Retail Tracking Service/ Actual Unit Product Line Sales (Retail & Commercial Combined)/ Jan - Dec 2019 Writes First Time, Every Time! The BIC Round Stic Xtra Life Ball Pen offers dependable performance and starts writing when you do. This pen writes 90% longer on average than Papermate InkJoy 100 Ball Stick Pen.** The reliable tungsten carbide ball offers consistent ink flow and is suitable for a variety of everyday writing tasks, making this classic ballpoint pen the perfect addition to your home, school, or office supplies. **Paper Mate and InkJoy are trademarks of Newell or an affiliate. Newell has not sponsored or approved and is not affiliated with this BIC branded product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Bic always does the trick!
reviews.reviewText: A Bic Round Stic in black ink is one of my most favorite pens, but they're just as great in other ink colors too! I never know when I may need blue ink for signatures/important documents or red ink for annotating things. I love that Bic offers pens with three different ink colors in one box because that definitely ups the convenience factor. Also, each ink color writes equally well and reliably, unlike competing pens from the brand with the two hearts logo. At only $6.39 for a box of 60, you can't go wrong here, considering the quality, convenience, and usefulness of these pens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, write fine.
reviews.reviewText: I liked the price & the durability of the pens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of holding
reviews.reviewText: These pens are aways smooth and true to color. No problem with smearing and easy to hold in your hand. Pen is just the right size for any hand and a great price for your pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to hold
reviews.reviewText: I like that it is comfortable to hold and writes smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wish the variety was balanced
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this at a pretty reasonable price. I'm a student so I go through pens alot and this has good quality. That being said, it's a variety pack that has 60 pens total and although I mostly use black pens I wish this was more balanced. They could of given us 20 of each (since 20×3=60). I believe the 10 red pens I received are going to run out quickly because I use those to make corrections and to make my text stand out. I mainly use the black pen, add things with the blue pen and make corrections with the red. It feels like I will never run out of black but will run out of blue and red which means I will have to purchase them separately (which is costly) or continue to buy the variety pack only to receive an endless supply of black pens. I don't think anyone would be upset if the pens were evenly distributed. This is a convenient purchase but I'm also a bit annoyed that I will have to be on the hunt for blue and red pens (since I bought a variety pack that should last for a long time).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this box of pens and at first I was a little worried that some maybe defective. I've used all the colors that comes inside and all the pens worked perfectly fine. I'm very happy with this purchase and will make another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm always losing pens so a bulk pack is a must!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get what I ordered
reviews.reviewText: Appreciate how they write easy & variety of colors.
Muy buenas plumas, pintan bien, no se atora la tinta al eacribir, y llegaron en buen estado. Las volvería a comprar! :)
Cheap and effective. Gets the job done. Can’t ask for more than that.
Beautiful pens. Writes so smooth. Go for it without any doubt.

Es un buen producto a un buen precio, por la cantidad de plumas y el costo, no me gusto que al contar las piezas, venían completas las rojas, las azules pero las negras me faltó una... Quizás poner más atención en eso, por lo demás todo bien!
